text: The Oceania Zonal Volleyball Association (OZVA), is the governing body for the sports of indoor, beach and grass volleyball in Oceania. In the spirit of the FIVB 2001 Plan, AVC was the first to create five Zonal Associations at the 10th General Assembly in December 1993 prior to the FIVB Centennial Congress in September 1994. ==Members associations== {|class="wikitable sortable hlist" style="text-align:center; font-size:100%;" ! !!
